Literature.Title: Identification and characterization of novel cecropins from the Oxysternon conspicillatum neotropic dung beetle.
Literature.Author: Toro Segovia LJ, Téllez Ramírez GA, Henao Arias DC, Rivera Duran JD, Bedoya JP, Castano Osorio JC

Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: Human erythrocytes:0% Hemolysis=250 µg/ml,Human erythrocytes:50% Hemolysis=500 µg/ml,Vero cells:20% Killing=250 µg/ml
Sequence Information.Target Organism: Escherichia coli ATCC 35218(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Escherichia coli(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Enterobacter cloacae(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Klebsiella pneumoniae ATCC BAA-1705(MIC=3.12µg/ml),Salmonella typhimurium(MIC=6.25µg/ml),Pseudomonas aeruginosa ATCC 105663(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus saprophyticus(MIC=12.5µg/ml),Staphylococcus epidermidis(MIC=>200µg/ml),Staphylococcus aureus(MIC=>200µg/ml),Candida parapsilosis ATCC 22019(MIC=>200µg/ml)
